Multiple users cannot publish same content in one or different websites.
Users can allow others to advertise their publishing.
User can fix terms on advertising their contents.
Users can create micro pages & multiple web pages by selecting the contents uploaded by other in different websites based on the content contributors’ terms to advertise.
